name: Turk
description: '''Tab Virgil Jr.''' (born February 8, 1981) better known by his stage name '''Turk''' (sometimes "'''Young Turk"''' or "'''Hot Boy Turk'''" or "'''CFOTAB'''"), is an American rapper from [[New Orleans]], [[Louisiana]]. He is best known for his late 1990s run at [[Birdman (rapper)|Birdman]]'s [[Cash Money Records]] with the group the [[Hot Boys]].
